*0 spicy *0 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Watmel''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Magost]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sweet and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Magost]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !!
